title: A Randomized Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Multi-Center Study of HTN-295 (ACE inhibitor) in Patients With Colorectal Cancer
officialTitle: A Randomized Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Multi-Center Study of HTN-295 (ACE inhibitor) in Patients With Colorectal Cancer
description: This is a randomized double-blind, placebo-controlled multi-center study designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of HTN-295 (ACE inhibitor) in patients with Colorectal Cancer. The study will enroll approximately 348 patients.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adults aged 22-56 years
- Confirmed diagnosis of Colorectal Cancer
- ECOG performance status 0-1
- Adequate organ function
- Willing and able to provide informed consent
- Measurable disease per RECIST v1.1
- Prior treatment with standard therapy
- Life expectancy ≥3 months

Exclusion Criteria:
- Known hypersensitivity to study drug or excipients
- Pregnant or breastfeeding women
- Participation in another interventional study within 30 days
- Significant cardiovascular disease within past 6 months
- Active or chronic infection requiring systemic treatment
- Brain metastases unless treated and stable
- Prior treatment with similar mechanism of action
- Other active malignancy requiring treatment
